member.param: Dataset ID to send to the stored procedure

member.param: Dataset ID to send to the stored procedure
member.returns: True if success; false if failure

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.iMSFileInfoScanner.ProcessMSFileOrDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Main processing function, with input file / directory path, plus output directory path
member.param: Path to the input file or directory; can contain a wildcard (* or ?)
Directory to write any results files to
member.returns: True if success, False if an error

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.iMSFileInfoScanner.ProcessMSFileOrDirectory(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.iMSFileInfoScanner.MSFileProcessingStateConstants@)
member.summary: Main processing function with input / output paths, error code reset flag, and processing state
member.param: Path to the input file or directory; can contain a wildcard (* or ?)
Directory to write any results files to
If true, reset the error code
member.returns: True if success, False if an error

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.iMSFileInfoScanner.ProcessMSFileOrDirectoryWildcard(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calls ProcessMSFileOrDirectory for all files in inputFileOrDirectoryPath and below having a known extension
member.param: Path to the input file or directory; can contain a wildcard (* or ?)
Directory to write any results files to
If true, reset the error code
member.returns: True if success, False if an error

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.iMSFileInfoScanner.ProcessMSFilesAndRecurseDirectories(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calls ProcessMSFileOrDirectory for all files in inputFilePathOrDirectory and below having a known extension
member.param: Path to the input file or directory; can contain a wildcard (* or ?)
Directory to write any results files to
Maximum depth to recurse; Set to 0 to process all directories
member.returns: True if success, False if an error

member.summary: Save cached results now
member.returns: True if successful, false if an error

member.summary: Save cached results now

member.name: T:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions
member.summary: MS file info scanner options

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DEFAULT_DATASET_STATS_FILENAME
member.summary: Default dataset stats text file name

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_TEXT_FILE_LINES_TO_CHECK
member.summary: Default maximum number of lines to check in text files

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_XML_ELEMENT_NODES_TO_CHECK
member.summary: Default maximum number of XML nodes to examine in XML files

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MINIMUM_MZ_THRESHOLD_ITRAQ
member.summary: Default m/z threshold for iTRAQ labeled samples
member.remarks: All MS/MS spectra should have a scan range that starts below this value

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MINIMUM_MZ_THRESHOLD_ITRAQ_STRING
member.summary: String version of the default m/z threshold for iTRAQ labeled samples

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MINIMUM_MZ_THRESHOLD_TMT
member.summary: Default m/z threshold for TMT labeled samples
member.remarks: All MS/MS spectra should have a scan range that starts below this value

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MINIMUM_MZ_THRESHOLD_TMT_STRING
member.summary: String version of the default m/z threshold for TMT labeled samples

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.InputDataFilePath
member.summary: Input file path
member.remarks: This path can contain wildcard characters, e.g. C:\*.raw

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.OutputDirectoryPath
member.summary: Output directory path

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ParameterFilePath
member.summary: Key=Value parameter file path
member.remarks: This property is intended for use when using MSFileInfoScanner.dll along with a parameter file For MSFileInfoScanner.exe, specify the parameter file using /Conf or /P

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.RecurseDirectories
member.summary: When true, recurse subdirectories
member.remarks: This will be auto-set to true if MaxLevelsToRecurse is defined in the parameter file or if /S is used at the command line This functionality is enabled by the ArgExistsProperty option

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MaxLevelsToRecurse
member.summary: Process files in subdirectories

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.IgnoreErrorsWhenRecursing
member.summary: When true, ignore errors when recursing

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LogMessagesToFile
member.summary: When true, create a log file
member.remarks: This is auto-set to true if /L or /LogDir is used at the command line, or if LogfilePath or LogDirectory have a name defined in a parameter file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LogFilePath
member.summary: Log file path

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LogDirectoryPath
member.summary: Log directory path

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.WriteStatusToFile
member.summary: When true, report progress and errors using a status file
member.remarks: This is auto-set to true if /SF is used at the command line, or if StatusFilePath has a name defined in a parameter file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.StatusFilePath
member.summary: Status file path

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMzResolution
member.summary: m/z resolution when centroiding data for LC/MS 2D plots
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMinPointsPerSpectrum
member.summary: Minimum points per spectrum for inclusion on LC/MS 2D plots
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMaxChargeState
member.summary: Maximum charge state to display when plotting deisotoped data (from a DeconTools _isos.csv file)
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMaxPointsToPlot
member.summary: Maximum points to plot on each LC/MS 2D plot
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMinIntensity
member.summary: Minimum intensity to require for each mass spectrum data point when adding data to LC/MS 2D plots
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSPlotMaxMonoMass
member.summary: Maximum monoisotopic mass for deisotoped LC/MS plots

remarks.para: This is only used when PlottingDeisotopedData is true, which will be the case if the source data is a DeconTools _isos.csv file
This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.LCMSOverviewPlotDivisor
member.summary: The divisor to use when creating the overview 2D LC/MS plots If 0, do not create overview plots
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated via the Options class after MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated Use MSFileInfoProcessorBaseClass.LCMS2DPlotOptions instead

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.SaveTICAndBPIPlots
member.summary: When true, save TIC and BPI plots

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.HideEmptyHTMLSections
member.summary: When true, hide empty HTML sections

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.TestLCMSGradientColorSchemes
member.summary: When true, save a series of 2D LC plots, each using a different color scheme

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.UseDatasetNameForHtmlPlotsFile
member.summary: When true, use dataset name for the HTML plot file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DatasetID
member.summary: Dataset ID

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.CreateDatasetInfoFile
member.summary: When true, create the dataset info XML file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.CreateScanStatsFile
member.summary: When true, create scan stats files

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ComputeOverallQualityScores
member.summary: When true, compute quality scores

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.CheckCentroidingStatus
member.summary: When true, check centroiding status

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.CopyFileLocalOnReadError
member.summary: When true, copy the instrument file locally if a read error occurs

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.SaveLCMS2DPlots
member.summary: When true, create 2D LC/MS plots
member.remarks: This will be auto-set to true if LCMS2DMaxPointsToPlot is defined in the parameter file or if /LC is used at the command line This functionality is enabled by the ArgExistsProperty option

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MS2MzMinString
member.summary: Minimum m/z value that all MS/MS spectra should have Can be a numeric value, or the text iTRAQ or TMT

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MS2MzMin
member.summary: Minimum m/z value that all MS/MS spectra should have
member.remarks: Auto-defined when Validate is called based on MS2MzMinString

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DisableInstrumentHash
member.summary: When true, disable computing the SHA-1 hash for the primary instrument data file(s)

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.UpdateDatasetStatsTextFile
member.summary: When true, update (or create) a tab-delimited text file with overview stats for each dataset
member.remarks: This will be auto-set to true if DatasetStatsTextFileName is defined in the parameter file or if /DST is used at the command line This functionality is enabled by the ArgExistsProperty option

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DatasetStatsTextFileName
member.summary: When defined, update (or create) a tab-delimited text file with overview stats for the dataset

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ScanStart
member.summary: Optional filter for the first scan number to process

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ScanEnd
member.summary: Optional filter for the last scan number to process

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ShowDebugInfo
member.summary: When true, show debug messages

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.CheckFileIntegrity
member.summary: When true, check file integrity

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MaximumTextFileLinesToCheck
member.summary: Maximum number of lines to process when checking text or csv files
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated after class MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.MaximumXMLElementNodesToCheck
member.summary: Maximum number of XML nodes to examine when checking XML files
member.remarks: This value cannot be updated after class MSFileInfoScanner is instantiated

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ComputeFileHashes
member.summary: Compute file hashes when CheckFileIntegrity is true

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ZipFileCheckAllData
member.summary: When CheckFileIntegrity is true, also validate zip files (quick check)

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.UseCacheFiles
member.summary: When enabled, save/load information from the acquisition time file (cache file)

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ReprocessExistingFiles
member.summary: Reprocess existing files

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.ReprocessIfCachedSizeIsZero
member.summary: When true, reprocess files that are already defined in the acquisition time file only if their cached size is 0

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.PostResultsToDMS
member.summary: When true, store the dataset info in the DMS database

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DatabaseConnectionString
member.summary: Database connection string

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.DSInfoStoredProcedure
member.summary: Dataset info stored procedure name

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.PlotWithPython
member.summary: When true, use Python script MSFileInfoScanner_Plotter.py instead of OxyPlot to create the plots

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.InfoScannerOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validate the options
member.remarks: This method is called from Program.cs
member.returns: True if all options are valid

member.name: T:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions
member.summary: Options class for the LCMSDataPlotter

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_CHARGE_STATE
member.summary: Default maximum charge state to display when plotting deisotoped data (from a DeconTools _isos.csv file)

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_POINTS_TO_PLOT
member.summary: Default maximum number of points to plot on each LC/MS 2D plot

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MIN_POINTS_PER_SPECTRUM
member.summary: Default minimum points per spectrum for inclusion on LC/MS 2D plots

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_LCMS2D_OVERVIEW_PLOT_DIVISOR
member.summary: Default divisor to use when creating the overview 2D LC/MS plots

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MZ_RESOLUTION
member.summary: Default m/z resolution when centroiding data for LC/MS 2D plots

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MS1_PLOT_TITLE
member.summary: Default MS1 plot title

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MS2_PLOT_TITLE
member.summary: Default MS2 plot title

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_MONO_MASS_FOR_DEISOTOPED_PLOT
member.summary: Default maximum monoisotopic mass for deisotoped LC/MS plots

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_MONO_MASS_FOR_ZOOMED_DEISOTOPED_PLOT
member.summary: Default maximum monoisotopic mass for the zoomed deisotoped LC/MS plot

member.name: F:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.mMaxMonoMass
member.summary: Maximum monoisotopic mass for the deisotoped plot
member.remarks: This is only used when PlottingDeisotopedData is true, which will be the case if the source data is a DeconTools _isos.csv file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.DeleteTempFiles
member.summary: When true, delete temporary files

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.OverviewPlotDivisor
member.summary: The divisor to use when creating the overview 2D LC/MS plots The max points to plot value (MaxPointsToPlot) is divided by the overview plot divisor to compute the number of points to include on the overview plot
member.remarks: If 0, do not create overview plots

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MaxChargeToPlot
member.summary: Maximum charge state to display when plotting deisotoped data (from a DeconTools _isos.csv file)

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MaxPointsToPlot
member.summary: Maximum number of points to plot

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MinPointsPerSpectrum
member.summary: Minimum points per spectrum for inclusion on LC/MS 2D plots

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MS1PlotTitle
member.summary: MS1 plot title

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MS2PlotTitle
member.summary: MS2 plot title

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MZResolution
member.summary: m/z resolution to use when centroiding spectra

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MinIntensity
member.summary: Minimum intensity to require for each mass spectrum data point when adding data to LC/MS 2D plots

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.MaxMonoMassForDeisotopedPlot
member.summary: Maximum monoisotopic mass for deisotoped LC/MS plots
member.remarks: This is only used when PlottingDeisotopedData is true, which will be the case if the source data is a DeconTools _isos.csv file

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.PlottingDeisotopedData
member.summary: This will be set to true when we're plotting deisotoped data (from a DeconTools _isos.csv file)

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.PlotWithPython
member.summary: When true, use Python script MSFileInfoScanner_Plotter.py instead of OxyPlot to create the plots

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.TestGradientColorSchemes
member.summary: Set to True to print out a series of 2D plots, each using a different color scheme

member.name: P:MSFileInfoScannerInterfaces.LCMSDataPlotterOptions.UseObservedMinScan
member.summary: True if we should use the observed minimum scan
